author: Paul Cullen
title: Coronavirus: 99 clusters in nursing homes across the country
description: Hiqa opens infection prevention and control hub to advise social care services
content:
There are now 99 clusters of Covid-19 in nursing homes, 65 of them in the east of the country, data released on Monday evening shows.
Two-thirds of nursing home cases were community-acquired, 23 per cent arose from contact with confirmed cases of Covid-19 an… [+2946 chars]
